item.description:
It's time for our March Meetup!!!!! This time we are holding it on a Saturday evening. Hopefully that works for you. Please join me for a fun evening of Karaoke.

The Limelight in Boston has graciously offered to let us use their location again. When you get there please look for me in one of the private Karaoke Rooms.

We had a terrific time at the February Meetup and I look forward to seeing all of you again in a few weeks. The Limelight is the perfect place for us to meet, it's conveniently located in the Theater District in Boston, it has a wonderful selection of songs to sing and everyone there is so nice.

I will see you there! If you need anything, my cell phone is 617-429-6571.

Thanks,
- Phil
item.name: Boston Karaoke March Get-Together
